headline: JPMorgan's Dimon and Citigroup's Fraser consider stablecoins in Wall Street crypto pivot
summary: The bosses of JPMorgan and Citigroup said Tuesday they intend to get involved in stablecoins, the latest evidence of how Wall Street is pivoting to embrace digital assets.

headline: Watershed Expands Global Presence with First Latin American Office
summary: MEXICO CITY, MEXICO, July 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Watershed, the enterprise sustainability platform trusted by companies like Airbnb, General Motors, Carlyle Group, FedEx, and Visa, today announced an expansion of its global operations to Latin America with the launch of a new Mexico City office. headline: JPMorgan gets a dealmaking boost as Wall Street recovered from tariff tumult
summary: Second quarter results at JPMorgan Chase were better than expected Tuesday, as a boost in dealmaking demonstrated how Wall Street recovered from the spring freeze that accompanied President Trump's "Liberation Day" tariffs.

headline: JPMorgan posts strong second quarter numbers, though Dimon warns of tariff, geopolitical risk
summary: JPMorgan’s second-quarter profit fell to $15 billion in second quarter, but the New York bank beat Wall Street expectations.  CEO Jamie Dimon on Tuesday touted another strong performance by the bank, particularly its markets division, where revenue rose by 15% to $8.9 billion.  JPMorgan earned an adjusted $5.24 per share in the period, beating the $4.48 analysts were calling for but down from last year’s $6.12 per share.

raw.headline: JPMorgan posts strong second quarter numbers, though Dimon warns of tariff, geopolitical risk

JPMorgan earned an adjusted $5.24 per share in the period, beating the $4.48 analysts were calling for but down from last year’s $6.12 per share.

headline: Visa Is One of the Largest Financial Companies by Market Cap. But Is It a Buy?
summary: Despite macro uncertainty, Visa posted strong growth in revenue and payment volume in the latest fiscal quarter.  Visa is one of the world's most profitable companies, with a net margin that typically hovers above 50%.  When it comes to businesses in the financial services sector, investors are probably familiar with those with a consumer-facing presence.

headline: Yeahka expands payment options for HSBC Digital Merchant Services
summary: Yeahka (9923.HK) is leveraging its extensive payment network to support HSBC in enhancing HSBC Digital Merchant Services by expanding the payment options available to its merchants in Hong Kong. The newly-added payment methods include Alipay, AlipayHK and WeChat Pay.

headline: Odoo partners with Tyro to provide seamless payment services in Australia
summary: Odoo, a global leader of all-in-one business management software, has joined forces with Tyro, Australia's leading payments provider, to provide seamless payment experiences to small businesses and their customers.
